product_name: Seattle Sports Blazer USB Front Bike Light
long_description: Featuring a USB-rechargeable battery, the Seattle Sports Blazer USB Front Bike Light offers a quick-mounting design and bright LEDs to alert motorists and other cyclists to your presence.
short_description: Featuring a USB-rechargeable battery, the Seattle Sports Blazer USB Front Bike Light offers a quick-mounting design and bright LEDs to alert motorists and other cyclists to your presence.
